name: MarZ Rising
detailed_description:
2065: Humanity prepares itself for the colonization of Mars. The early history of the red planet, however, holds some mysterious surprises. There is already life on Mars – (un)dead life.
Guide your crew through a breathtaking single-player campaign and solve the mystery of the undead. Well-thought-out base building and skillful resource management are the key to fending off zombie attacks. The game challenges your creativity and each level demands new tactical approaches. It is up to you to make quick, clear decisions and limit the spread of these creatures. This is the only way for you and your crew to get through the mission safely.

PLAN YOUR BASE

Assess the overwhelming Mars landscape to produce a strategical power grid and create a building grid without restrictions.

MANAGE YOUR RESOURCES

Mine building materials to construct new buildings.

MICROMANAGE YOUR CREW

Organize your crew to fend off single attackers, man buildings or occupy whole fronts.

RESEARCH AND GROW

Explore new buildings and super weapons to expand your defense.

GET RID OF THEM

Defend your base from approaching zombie hordes. It is your duty to secure all infested Mars areas to guarantee the future of the first human settlement of the ISS Aurora.

DISCOVER WHERE THEY CAME FROM

Follow the exciting story and discover two alternative endings in a thrilling single-player campaign.


BE READY TO MANAGE ALL AT ONCE!

short_description: MarZ Rising is a tactical base defense game, which lets you discover a completely new gameplay experience of the tower defense genre! Build, manage and defend your martian base. Guide your crew safely through the thrilling campaign and solve the mystery of the undead.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant graphics card with 1GB dedicated memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: MarZ Rising is still in development and system requirements may change.
